description:
No cold fingers on pow days. Windproof, waterproof insulated mitts keep hands toasty whether you're riding the chair or bombing down black diamonds. Waterproof fabric, a DWR finish, taped seams and a DryVent™ insert block out snow and water, while HeatSeeker Eco insulation and a fleece lining keep fingers cozy.

  • Durable recycled polyester shell with a DryVent™ insert for water- and windproof protection
  • Synthetic leather palm has Etip™ touchscreen-compatible sections
  • 160g Heatseeker Eco synthetic insulation on back of head, 120g on palm
  • Heavyweight fleece lining is soft against the skin and adds warmth
  • Articulated design keeps hands in their natural position
  • Full gauntlet keeps out snow
name: The North Face Montana Ski Mitts - Youths
